snippet: Falling oil prices have come with bitter and frightening memories of the Alaskan city in the mid-1980s, when the wild economic party ushered in by the Trans Alaska Pipeline shut down.
abstract: Sustained drop in oil prices has residents of Anchorage recalling mid-1980s downturn that occurred after Trans Alaska Pipeline shutdown; despite fact that city is now better positioned to weather drop in oil prices, due to greater diversification of its economy, collapse in the '80s remains as warning of worst that could happen.
lead_paragraph: Falling oil prices have come with bitter and frightening memories of the Alaskan city in the mid-1980s, when the wild economic party ushered in by the Trans Alaska Pipeline shut down.

headline.main: Matured Anchorage Struggles to Shake Haunting Memories
headline.print_headline: Matured Anchorage Struggles to Shake Haunting Memories
